name: Ballhalla (itch)
description:
I made this game over the course of about 4 days and it's my first 'finished' project!

Control a ball and avoid obstacles! Powered by Unreal Engine 5.

Made for Low Effort Jam 24

Controls:

WASD - Controls movement, is based on camera direction.

Mouse - Controls Camera

Mouse Wheel - Camera Distance

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Quick boost to speed! Based on camera direction. 5 second recharge.

LCtrl - Brake. Locks rotation in all axes

Tab - Return to level start

Esc - Exit game

Alt+Tab switches between full screen and windowed!
